reviewText: I normally love this series.  Probably my favorite besides Pride.  One thing I was curious about, why are all of the kissing scenes edited out?  I've seen them in the original TV series but they were definitely missing in the DVD version.  It made this version a little strange.  Was this the G version?
I absolutely loved this drama! It was extremely touching! I cannot recommend it enough for all you hopeless romantics! Truly adorable!

It was actally quite a decent Japanese Series.
Most of them are pretty lame but this has the right amount of pure sweet love and a nice dose of reality.
**Recommended**
I like this show alot. I'm a fan of Kazuya Kamenashi & I think this show is the right amount of funny & drama for anyone.
